name: Nombrilo
description: Generate block distributions for Minecraft worlds. Uses custom serde support for SIMD-accelerated NBT parsing.

name: kirsten.pl
description: This website! Built using Astro and Tailwind CSS, hosted on Cloudflare Pages.

name: serve
description: Simple file server with firewalld integration.

name: agent-sim
description: An agent-based simulation of disease spread. I used this mostly as an opportunity to explore a dynamic quadtree to handle collision detection between agents.

name: smath-classes
description: Unofficial course catalog for the North Carolina School of Science and Mathematics.

name: Research in ML-based Translation
description: Modified transformer model to show improvement in machine translation by using joint part of speech tagging.
imageAlt: Slide discussing Transformer model and changes

name: Covid Wave Predictor
description: Made for the 2021 UniHacks hackathon, this project predicts the likelihood of a Covid wave in a given area using a custom neural network.
imageAlt: The Covid Wave Predictor homepage, with a map of Covid in the US broken down by county
